ns2:li: Monitors physical access to the information system to detect and respond to physical security incidents;
Coordinates results of reviews and investigations with the organizations incident response capability.

ns2:p.#text: Investigation of and response to detected physical security incidents, including apparent security violations or suspicious physical access activities, are part of the organizations incident response capability.
The organization monitors real-time physical intrusion alarms and surveillance equipment.
The organization employs automated mechanisms to recognize potential intrusions and initiate designated response actions.
